name: mari90ld
description:
Yesterday I found out that GMTK was hosting a game jam, so I decided to participate.

Basically, you control this little orange square and the goal is to get to the little yellow square, maneuvering  through the sort of white space. The catch? The theme of GMTK's jam is "only one", so I gave the game only one control: pressing the space bar.

Keep in mind that I am not a game dev team, I am a kid who watches GMTK and likes programming.

Any and all feedback is more than welcome.
